abstract: infosonics receives daily media sentiment score of 0.19 .
article: news articles about infosonics have trended somewhat positive this week , according to accern . accern identifies negative and positive press coverage by analyzing more than 20 million news and blog sources . accern ranks coverage of public companies on a scale of -1 to 1 , with scores nearest to one being the most favorable . infosonics earned a media sentiment score of 0.19 on accern 's scale . accern also gave media stories about the communications equipment provider an impact score of 45.2789080420729 out of 100 , meaning that recent press coverage is somewhat unlikely to have an impact on the stock 's share price in the immediate future .

separately , valuengine raised shares of infosonics from a `` sell '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a research note on monday , october 2nd . shares of infosonics traded down $ 0.01 during trading on friday , hitting $ 1.51 . 26,462 shares of the stock were exchanged , compared to its average volume of 78,393 . infosonics has a 12 month low of $ 1.32 and a 12 month high of $ 5.20 . infosonics last announced its quarterly earnings data on thursday , november 9th . the communications equipment provider reported earnings per share for the quarter .

infosonics had a negative net margin of 13.88 % and a negative return on equity of 38.12 % . the business had revenue of $ 6.01 million during the quarter . trademark violation warning : this story was published by watch list news and is owned by of watch list news . if you are reading this story on another domain , it was illegally copied and republished in violation of united states & international trademark and copyright legislation . the correct version of this story can be accessed at company profileinfosonics corporation is a provider of wireless handsets , tablets and accessories to carriers and distributors in latin america and the united states .
the company defines , sources and sells a line of products under the verykool brand .
